definition: to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Applique art has a long history in China.
sentences.chinese: 補花藝術，在我國有着悠久的歷史。
